text:
How to maximize an objective function for linear programming

\begin{array}{l}\n2 \leq x \leq 6 \\\n1 \leq y \leq 5 \\\nx+y \leq 8 \\\nM a x \text { for } P=3 x+2 y\n\end{array}[imath]2 \leq x \leq 6 [/imath] [imath]1 \leq y \leq 5 [/imath] [imath]x+y \leq 8 [/imath] [imath]M a x \text { for } P=3 x+2 y[/imath]
